# 𒅍 𓀋

𒅍 gur₃
𒅍 ga.ri 𒂵 𒂆 𒊏 𒋃
𒅍 guru₃ carry
𒅍 il₂ elevate, lift, levitate

𒅍 il₂ -er 𓀋 person suffix in

𒁆 dub₂ •drub "drum" 𒁆𒅍 balaĝ-il₂ drummer 𒂵 GA galac "milk" 𒂵𒅍 ga-il₂ milk-carrier

The last one is integral to the sign 𓀋

𒅍 ∋ 𒂵 galac in
𒂵𒅍 ga-il₂ milk-carrier !

𒅍 guru₃ 𜕀 guru 𓈎𓄿𓅱𓀠 grave great
𒅍 guru₃ carrier 𒅍𒊒 gur₃-ru; gur;gur17;guru6 "carrier, bearer"
𒀉𒅍 ʷa.gur₃ worker "laborer" ⇔ 𒀀𒅍 a-gur₃ "a carrier" a.il2 (sic)
𒀉𒅍 a2-il2 𒀀𒅍 a-il2 "carrier" Eil-Bote 𒀀𒅍 ba'gur₃ "packer"

𒅍 gaĝ /gang/ ≈ 𒂵𒋃 GA.AĜ3 "carry" going
